snippet: Starter Jeremy Hefner, whose elbow will be examined Monday, was optioned to Class AAA Las Vegas, clearing a roster spot for Jon Niese.
abstract: New York Mets option pitcher Jeremy Hefner to Class AAA Las Vegas, but an elbow problem could land him on the disabled list; move clears roster spot for Jon Niese.
lead_paragraph: Starter Jeremy Hefner, whose elbow will be examined Monday, was optioned to Class AAA Las Vegas, clearing a roster spot for Jon Niese.
